content: VENN | HOMEPAGE Watch Live Search Featured shows Gaming & Guests Coming up next on Venn FULL SCHEDULE Full schedule WHAT THEY'RE SAYING VENN, Hoping to be Gaming’s Answer to MTV, Raises $26 Million VENN Secures $26M Series A Funding, Hires MTV Exec Esports Network VENN Raises $26 Million Series A Round Video Game Entertainment & News Network VENN is a live 24/7 network for gaming, streaming, esports and entertainment audiences. Broadcasting live from Los Angeles, VENN is universally distributed across a broad range of media platforms including Twitch, YouTube, Samsung TV Plus, The Roku Channel, VIZIO and more. VENN offers original programming produced in-house and in partnership with some of the biggest names and creators across the gaming, pop culture and lifestyle spaces.
